alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 17 at 3:43AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is now in effect for all of American Samoa... * Strong north winds of 29 to 38 mph with higher gusts... * TIMING...through this afternoon * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 343 VAVEAO ASO LUA IANUARI 17 2023 ...Ua iai nei le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O savili malolosi mai matu e 29 i le 38 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u... * TAIMI...seia oo i le aoauli nei * AAFIAGA...E ono pauu laau, lelea mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma e faaleagaina foi apa ma taualuga o fale. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi, o lona uiga o savili e 29 i le 38 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u i le 57 mph, o loo aafia ai le atunu`u. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Fa`amolemole ia e fa`aeteete.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 29 to 38 MPH with gusts up to 57 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
